message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. It's a great deal, and I know you'll appreciate its value. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of your product, but I am only able to pay up to $9,500 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $9,500 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway.  How about $10,250?  This gives us both a good deal.

Hello Alice, thank you for your response. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with $10,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and I hope you agree.
